About Me

Crafting Digital Experiences

A passionate frontend engineer turning complex requirements into elegant, performant web applications.

I'm Manjeet Yadav, a Senior Angular Frontend Engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience building enterprise-scale web applications. My journey spans from Angular 8 to Angular 17+, including legacy AngularJS modernization projects.

I specialize in crafting high-performance, accessible, and SEO-optimized applications using Angular's latest features — standalone components, signals, SSR with hydration, and reactive patterns with RxJS. My work with Shopify Embedded Apps has given me deep expertise in third-party platform integrations, App Bridge, and OAuth flows.

I believe in architecture-driven development — where every component, service, and route is purposefully designed for scalability, testability, and long-term maintainability. My code follows strict TypeScript practices with zero any types, OnPush change detection, and clean separation of concerns.

View My Work Get In Touch

Quick Facts

Location

India

Experience

3+ Years in Angular Development

Specialty

Angular, TypeScript, RxJS, SSR

Focus

Performance, Architecture, Clean Code

Engineering Philosophy

Architecture-First Mindset

Every project starts with a solid architecture. I design scalable, modular systems using feature-based structure, lazy loading, and strict separation of concerns.

Performance Obsessed

From CLS optimization to bundle analysis, I ensure every application meets Lighthouse 95+ scores. Performance is not an afterthought — it's built into every decision.

Legacy Modernization Expert

Transformed AngularJS applications to modern Angular 17+ with standalone components, signals, and SSR — without disrupting business continuity.

Clean Code Advocate

Strict TypeScript, no `any` types, OnPush change detection everywhere, DRY principles, and comprehensive error handling. Code should read like a well-written document.

Career Journey

Present

Senior Angular Frontend Engineer

Enterprise Projects

Leading frontend architecture for enterprise-scale Angular applications. Implementing SSR, micro-frontends, and performance optimization strategies.

2023

Angular Developer

Shopify Integration Projects

Built Shopify Embedded Apps using App Bridge, OAuth flows, and REST API integrations. Delivered pixel-perfect UIs with Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

2022

Frontend Developer

Web Applications

Developed and maintained Angular 8-14 applications. Led AngularJS to Angular migration efforts and established component architecture standards.
